body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. detain an opponent's creature
2. pass the turn What is the expected output? What do you see instead? detained creature can't attack or use activated abilities until the end of your next turn. The effect ends with your current turn instead. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? Magarena 1.36, Win 7 Home If you are reporting a game play bug, please attach your game.log file. If you are reporting a crash, please attach both crash.log and game.log files (both files are found in the main game folder). Please provide any additional information below.
